ol.li: Click on the Focus Sessions Focus sessions image icon on the left navigation toolbar
Under the "Ready, Set, Focus" section, Enter the number of minutes you have at your disposal.
If you do not want breaks, tick the checkbox next to "Skip Breaks".
The countdown time is tracked and at the end of it, you will receive a reminder asking you to take a 5 minute break from work.

p.b: Customize break period and focus period:

ol.li: Click the "See More" See more icon icon in the same section.
Select the desired duration of Focus and break periods.
The changes made in this setting will be reflected when you return to the "Ready, Set, Focus" section.
